articles.description: Athiya Shetty was star attraction at the Bombay Stock Exchange's Muhurat Trading on Diwali. The actor rang the opening bell to kick off the proceedings.

articles.title: Nilesh Shah has 3 lessons for mutual fund investors - Economic Times
articles.description: ‘Any investor who did regular investments and who did asset allocation and who took a long term view has made money in this Samvat year.

articles.title: Elon Musk Says He "Most Likely" Has Moderate Case Of Covid - NDTV
articles.description: Tesla Inc Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said on Saturday he "most likely" has a moderate case of COVID-19, as he continued to question the accuracy of the tests.
articles.content:

articles.title: Explained: What is a technical recession? - The Indian Express
articles.description: Latest RBI bulletin projects contraction for a second consecutive quarter, which means the economy is in a ‘technical recession’. What does it mean, and how is it different from a ‘recession’ and a ‘recessionary phase’?
articles.content:

Updated: November 13, 2020 12:27:38 pm
